subject: Ghosty boxes,
author: SnowfireL@aol.com
full_text:
--part1_c677.4517f8d4.3c7179f4_boundary

what's happened to Frank Sumption?  He could build a box for her  couldn't 
he?  I wish I could get one built for me too, I keep asking, but  no one 
wants to do one for me, and I've been asking for a original Frank's box  for 
years now.  sf
--part1_c677.4517f8d4.3c7179f4_boundary
